data.message: My account was suspended because  we had multiple accounts (not for spam) is for (fanz) pages that we are running for a client...so far twitter had unsuspended some after investigation and I was yold that it was a mistake...so please unsuspend this account as it is one of the accounts wrongly (by mistake) suspended as per twitter support

replies.message: Hey Reyada. We hear your frustration. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2n0SfgC. -Joe
